entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2 except plus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2 except plus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
